column5: Hello everyone,  Some Friends and I are looking to rent out a cottage for a weekend and get some fishing done. We live about 45 minutes southwest of Toronto and are willing to travel (by car) up to 3 hours away. We are looking for something preferably on the lake with boat rentals available as none of us have a boat. If anybody could give me any suggestions that would be great!  Thanks.
while it may bit a bit further then 3 hours..... Lakair cannot be beat!
Sparrow Lake falls in that range excellent pike and bass fishing. Also walleye and musky.
This is a little more than 3 hrs http://www.whitebirchescamp.com/ but the fishing is good and I will show you where the fish are(I am a seasonal camper there).  Vance
Lunge Haven cottages on Sturgeon lake
